faqs.q: How many calories in a standard Hershey bar?
faqs.a: About 210 calories for one 43 g milk chocolate bar.

faqs.q: What are the carbs and sugar in a Hershey bar?
faqs.a: 25 g total carbs, including 24 g sugars and 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is fat high in Hershey bars?
faqs.a: Yes, 13 g total fat per bar, with 8 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How does Hershey bar nutrition compare to other chocolates?
faqs.a: Similar to many milk chocolates; darker versions may have less sugar but more fiber.
